markdownRemark.html:
This page is meant to be a dynamic collection of various QC tools that are available, with a brief summary of its purpose, how it is meant to be used, what the results are and whether they are open source and free.

If you see a mistake in this description or you don't see your own tool or a tool that you think should belong here, please send a pull request (PR) with the changes needed, or open an issue at the niQC repo. Thank you for your contribution.

Table of Contents

  1. Multimodal
  2. Anatomical MRI
  3. Functional MRI
  4. Diffusion MRI
  5. ASL
  6. Scanner/Hardware
  7. Miscellaneous

Multimodal

Tool Modalities Interaction Technology
VisualQC Various modalities (T1wMRI, fMRI, DWI, Quantitative MR) Interactive Python

Anatomical (T1w MRI etc)

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology Outputs
VisualQC Detect and rate artefacts, Accuracy of volumetric or suface segmentations, check alignment Interactive Pure Python Plots, reports
MindControl Identify outliers, Annotate, Review anatomical accuracy, Edit and correct voxels Interactive Python, Javascript

Functional MRI

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology
VisualQC Detect and rate artefacts, Accuracy of volumetric or suface segmentations, check alignment Interactive Pure python
MRIQC Generate visulization and reports, identify unusable scans Batch processing Pure python
dashQC Visualize distributions of quality metrics, check outliers and alignment Interactive JavaScript

Diffusion MRI

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology
DTIprep QC Batch processing C++
eddyqc QC batch processing C (FSL)
ExploreDTI - not free Visualization and quality assessment Interactive Matlab
VisualQC Detect and rate artefacts, check alignment Interactive Plots, reports

Arterial Spin Labeling

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology
ExploreASL image processing and statistics of ASL Batch processing Matlab/SPM

Scanner and Hardware QC

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology
UniQC Unified QC of MRI sequence development and fMRI artefacts TBA Matlab/SPM

Miscellaneous

Tool Purpose Interaction Technology
